## Library Submission Request

**Repository URL:** https://github.com/Alteriom/EByte_LoRa_E220_Series_Library  
**Release tag:** v1.0.0  
**Library name:** Alteriom_EByte_LoRa_E220

## Description

This is the Alteriom fork of the EByte LoRa E220 Series Library for Arduino. It provides comprehensive support for EByte E220 LoRa modules (LLCC68 chipset) with enhanced CI/CD, automated testing, and improved Arduino Library Manager compatibility.

### Key Features:
- Support for Arduino, ESP32, ESP8266, STM32, and Raspberry Pi Pico
- 5-10km communication range
- LLCC68 chipset support
- Wake-on-Radio (WOR) power saving mode
- RSSI monitoring capabilities
- Comprehensive examples and documentation
- Automated build and test pipeline

### Platforms Tested:
- Arduino UNO
- ESP32
- ESP8266
- STM32
- Raspberry Pi Pico

### Original Author Credit:
This library is a fork of the excellent work by Renzo Mischianti (https://github.com/xreef/EByte_LoRa_E220_Series_Library), enhanced by Alteriom with improved CI/CD and release automation.
